scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:backend -- --skip_finale_msgs && npm run deploy:webhook -- --skip_finale_msgs && npm run deploy:frontend -- --skip_finale_msgs
scripts.build:frontend: cd src/frontend/df-frontend-vue && npm i && npm run build && cd ../../.. && npm run cli transferdist:frontend -- --skip_placeholder_check
scripts.deploy:backend:full: npm run deploy:backend && cd deploy/backend/functions && npm i && npm run deploy:backend
scripts.deploy:frontend:full: npm run cli deploy:frontend -- --skip_backend_check && cd deploy/frontend && npm i && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.deploy:webhook: npm run build && npm run cli deploy:webhook
scripts.deploy:webhook:full: npm run deploy:webhook && cd deploy/webhook/functions && npm i && npm run deploy:webhook
scripts.git:submodules: git submodule init && git submodule update
scripts.install:all: npm i && npm run install:webhook && npm run install:server && npm run install:util
scripts.1st_time: npm run install:all && npm run git:submodules && npm run done --silent
scripts.done:
echo -e '

Last Step: Get a service-account.json file & add to the settings/ directory. 

See below for details: 

1) https://github.com/valgaze/df-starter-kit/blob/master/docs/service_account.md 

2) https://github.com/valgaze/df-starter-kit/blob/master/quickstart.md


'
scripts.deploy:server:express: npm run build && cd util/deployer && ts-node server.ts
scripts.deploy:server:cloudfunc: echo todo: eject to cloud func
scripts.cycle: npm run deploy:webhook && cd deploy/webhook/functions && npm i && npm run deploy
